Boost my @account today

Boost Your Instagram Insights Today!

Followers you didn't know you had will start noticing you! Make good use of it 🤭

Safe & Secure

No Account Actions
We don't perform any manual actions directly from your account, so there's zero risk to your profile.

Web Instance Technology
Our innovative method uses web instances through Instagram APIs, ensuring your account's safety while boosting your visibility.

Satisfaction Guaranteed

We stand by the quality of our service. If you're not completely satisfied with the results, we offer a full money-back guarantee. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we are confident in delivering the promised results.

Affordable & Scalable

Provider Pricing
Get the best rates as we offer provider-level pricing, making it cost-effective for both individual users and agencies.

Perfect for Reselling
Agencies can take advantage of our competitive pricing to resell this service, making it an excellent addition to your portfolio.

How does it work?

1.

Fill out our simple form with the necessary information about your profile.

2.

Our sale team will analyze your request and verify the details provided.






3.

Once the evaluation is completed, we will contact you via email and WhatsApp with our offer (based on the followers number and age of your account). After that, our technical team will start the process of adding your account's followers to your close friends list (through API ).

4.

We will provide you with live updates until all your followers will be successfully added, and you will be able to enjoy the growth of your stories, lives, posts, notes.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ's)

How can you do that?

Since 2014, we have been dedicated to discovering innovative ways to grow on social media. Our team of skilled growth hackers and technical experts is always up-to-date with the latest algorithm changes on major social media platforms. This expertise allows us to effectively optimize and enhance our clients' social media presence.

In August 2024, we are proud to be the first to launch a cutting-edge growth service that is already helping hundreds of accounts maximize their reach and engagement. With our proven strategies and hands-on approach, we ensure that your social media accounts achieve the best possible results from your followers.

How long will it take?

The duration of our service depends on the age of your account and the number of followers you have. Here’s a general timeline for our growth process:

  • Accounts with up to 100k followers: Typically, it takes 4-5 days to add all followers to their close friends list.
  • Accounts with 100k to 500k followers: The process usually takes 7-14 days.
  • Accounts with more than 500k followers: The timeline will be communicated based on your specific follower count.

During this time, you can continue to use your Instagram account as usual. Our process is entirely handled through APIs, ensuring that there is no disruption to your normal account activity and safety.

How can I stay in touch?

After placing your order, a member of our sales team will contact you via WhatsApp, e-mail or Telegram (according to your preference) and provide you with all necessary infos and updates.

How quickly will I see results?

After we'll complete the service you will be able to publish your first story, start a live or post a note or also photo post and check with your own eyes the amazing boost your reach will have. 

Can I resell Upphee's service?

Yes, we offer competitive provider-level pricing, making it ideal for agencies to resell our service. We are at the first level, and our pricing is the most affordable in the market.

Is there a risk of getting banned?

No, your profile does not risk any ban or limitation. Our operations are conducted externally through Instagram APIs, ensuring your account's full security. We work daily with dozen of accounts, never incurred in any block, ban,  not even a single warn from Instagram.

Customers

⭐ 4.8/5 based on 59 reviews

+840 Accounts Boosted

Customer reviews

Can I trust upphee.com? Does the service work?
Here are our customer reviews.

missmarlynxoxo

Content Creator

In 3 days they added all my 300k followers in my close friends list and I've tripled my average views! Super happy for my decision, and it was worth every penny.

Demy

Content Creator

Upphee has completely transformed my Instagram engagement. My stories are now seen by all my followers, and my product sales have increased significantly!

Lorenzo M.

Social Media Manager

As an agency owner, Upphee's provider pricing has allowed us to offer an amazing service to our clients at a competitive rate. Highly recommended!
